General.Name: Media Network Coin
General.Description:
Based on an existing alpha product, CoinJoker, the Media Network Token aims to solve some of the most serious issues in the existing quality of content on the market. The Media Network Token
(MNT) is an ERC20 token based on the Ethereum blockchain. These tokens will enable writers to build content of superior quality and receive tokens for their contributions.

ICO.Description:
Based on an existing alpha product, CoinJoker, the Media Network Token aims to solve some of the most serious issues in the existing quality of content on the market. The Media Network Token
(MNT) is an ERC20 token based on the Ethereum blockchain. These tokens will enable writers to build content of superior quality and receive tokens for their contributions.

The Media Network Token ICO started on the 15th of December 2017 and will end on the 15th of February 2018. The ICO token allocation represents 60% of the total token supply and will be available for a 0.0001 ETH price. The ICO funding target is set at 7500 ETH and users can participate with Ether only.

Token Reserve Split (40%):

  • 40% team
